text: Is GitHub CI having issues? Or, how do I diagnose problems if pushing didn't trigger a run?

elements.text: Is GitHub CI having issues? Or, how do I diagnose problems if pushing didn't trigger a run?

text: macOS? <https://julialang.slack.com/archives/CPWJ5DGG1/p1607730643405200>

elements.text: macOS?

text: if it isn't macOS, check out the "Actions" tab, it might have information about why the job didn't start.  also, if you open the yaml file with the github web editor, it has a linter, and it highlights the line where there are syntax errors

text: Alright, so I successfully ran some jobs on master, confirming that it is in fact something specific to Chris's account.

text: And since it happened on both VectorizationBase (which Chris owns) and also when Chris merged a PR in Gaius (which Chris does not own), it seems to be tied to anything that Chris does, even if it's not on his own repos
